name: Danilo Gallinari
comment: Gallinari (knee) said Sunday in an interview with Gianluca Bortolomai of AroundTheGame.com that his goal remains to return to game action at some point during the Celtics' postseason run.

name: Ben Simmons
comment: Simmons is Alex Schiffer of The Athletic for Friday's game versus the Bulls due to left knee soreness.

name: Kelly Oubre Jr.
comment: Oubre (hand) is probable for Friday's game against the Timberwolves.

name: Cody Martin
comment: Martin (knee) is  listed as out Friday against Minnesota.

name: Terry Rozier
comment: Rozier (hand) is probable for Friday's game against the Timberwolves.

name: Javonte Green
comment: Green (knee) has begun running but is still a couple of weeks away from doing contact work, Cody Westerlund of 670TheScore.com reports.

name: Lonzo Ball
comment: Bulls executive vice president of operations Arturas Karnisovas confirmed in an announcement Tuesday that Ball (knee) won't be available to play during the 2022-23 season.

name: Ricky Rubio
comment: Rubio is out for Thursday's game versus the Nuggets due to left knee injury management.

name: Maxi Kleber
comment: Kleber (hamstring) won't play Thursday's against the Spurs, but he said Wednesday that he's getting "very close" to a return, Tim MacMahon of ESPN.com reports.

name: Davis Bertans
comment: Bertans (calf) won't play in Thursday's game versus the Spurs.

name: Zeke Nnaji
comment: Nnaji (shoulder) has been ruled out for Thursday's matchup versus Cleveland.

name: Collin Gillespie
comment: Gillespie (lower leg) is out for Thursday's game versus the Cavaliers.

name: Aaron Gordon
comment: Gordon (ribs) will not play Thursday at Cleveland.

name: Marvin Bagley III
comment: Bagley (hand) has been ruled out for Thursday's matchup against the Magic.

name: R.J. Hampton
comment: Hampton (not injury related) won't be available to make his Pistons' debut Thursday versus the Magic, James L. Edwards III of The Athletic reports.

name: Nerlens Noel
comment: Noel (personal) is out Thursday's game versus the Magic.

name: Cade Cunningham
comment: Cunningham (lower leg) underwent successful surgery Friday to stabilize and promote healing of his left tibial stress fracture, James L. Edwards III of The Athletic reports.

name: Andrew Wiggins
comment: Wiggins (personal) is without a timetable for return, Anthony Slater of The Athletic reports.

name: Stephen Curry
comment: The Warriors announced Wednesday that Curry (lower leg) will be re-evaluated in a week.

name: Gary Payton II
comment: Warriors GM Bob Myers said Payton (core muscle injury) will be re-evaluated in one month according to Anthony Slater of The Athletic.

name: Andre Iguodala
comment: Iguodala (hip)  will not play Monday against Washington and remains without a timetable.

name: Jalen Green
comment: Green (groin) won't play in Friday's game versus the Warriors and is considered day-to-day, Coty M. Davis of SI.com reports.

name: Kevin Porter Jr.
comment: Correcting an earlier report, Porter (foot) will miss Friday's matchup against Golden State and has a "small chance" to play Sunday in Portland, Jonathan Feigen of the Houston Chronicle reports.

name: Ivica Zubac
comment: Zubac will miss Friday's game against the Kings due to a strained right calf, Andrew Greif of the Los Angeles Times reports.

name: D'Angelo Russell
comment: Russell suffered an ankle injury and is considered day-to-day, Mike Trudell of Spectrum SportsNet reports.

name: Luke Kennard
comment: Kennard will miss Thursday's game versus the Sixers due to a non-COVID illness.

name: Steven Adams
comment: Adams (knee) has been ruled out for Thursday's game against the 76ers, Chris Herrington of The Daily Memphian reports.

name: Kyle Lowry
comment: Head coach Erik Spoelstra indicated Thursday that Lowry (knee) would remain out indefinitely, Ira Winderman of the South Florida Sun-Sentinel reports.

name: Omer Yurtseven
comment: Yurtseven (ankle) is out for Friday's game versus Milwaukee, Ira Winderman of the South Florida Sun Sentinel reports.

name: Nikola Jovic
comment: Jovic (back) has been ruled out for Friday's game against the Bucks.

name: Wesley Matthews
comment: Matthews is out for Friday's game versus the Heat due to a right calf strain.

name: Giannis Antetokounmpo
comment: Antetokounmpo (wrist) is doubtful for Friday's game versus Miami.

name: Pat Connaughton
comment: Connaughton (calf) is doubtful for Friday's game versus the Heat.

name: Karl-Anthony Towns
comment: The Timberwolves are hopeful that Towns (calf) will be ready to return to the court at some point during their final "10-to-15 games" of the season, Shams Charania reported Tuesday during his "FanDuel TV" segment.

name: Dyson Daniels
comment: Daniels (ankle) has been ruled out for Thursday's game against the Raptors.

name: Zion Williamson
comment: Williamson (hamstring) has suffered a setback in his rehab and will be sidelined for several more weeks, Christian Clark of The New Orleans Times-Picayune reports.

name: E.J. Liddell
comment: Liddell (knee) signed a two-way contract with the Pelicans on Sunday.

name: Mitchell Robinson
comment: Robinson (thumb) is questionable for Friday's game versus the Wizards.

name: Aleksej Pokusevski
comment: Pokusevski (lower leg) was spotted on the court Monday doing some light shooting, Andrew Schlecht of The Athletic reports.

name: Chet Holmgren
comment: Holmgren (foot) underwent a successful secondary procedure Tuesday to remove hardware from his initial Lisfranc surgery in August, Michael Scotto of USA Today reports.

name: Dewayne Dedmon
comment: Dedmon (hip) has been ruled out for Thursday's game against the Grizzlies, Keith Pompey of The Philadelphia Inquirer reports.

name: Landry Shamet
comment: Shamet (foot) has been ruled out for Friday's game versus the Thunder and will be re-evaluated in a week, Gerald Bourguet of GoPHNX.com reports.

name: Cameron Payne
comment: Payne (foot) is questionable for Friday's game against the Clippers, Kellan Olson of ArizonaSports.com reports.

name: Kevin Durant
comment: Durant (knee) is planning to make his Phoenix debut on March 1 in Charlotte, Shams Charania of The Athletic reports.

name: Jerami Grant
comment: Grant has been ruled out for Thursday's matchup in Sacramento due to rest purposes.

name: Damian Lillard
comment: Lillard is out for Thursday's game versus the Kings due to rest.

name: Ibou Badji
comment: Badji (knee) is out for Thursday's game versus Sacramento.

name: Justise Winslow
comment: Winslow (ankle) has yet to resume full-contact activity and remains out indefinitely, Sean Highkin of RoseGardenReport.com reports.

name: Jusuf Nurkic
comment: Head coach Chauncey Billups said Nurkic (calf) is progressing, but the big man will remain out for Thursday's matchup against the Kings, Sean Highkin of RoseGardenReport.com reports.

name: Anfernee Simons
comment: Simons (ankle) is progressing in his recovery but remains without a timetable for a return, Sean Highkin of RoseGardenReport.com reports.

name: KZ Okpala
comment: Okpala (knee) won't play in Thursday's game versus the Trail Blazers.

name: Tre Jones
comment: Jones (foot)  will not play in Thursday's game against the Mavericks.

name: Khem Birch
comment: Birch (knee) has been ruled out for Thursday's matchup against the Mavericks.

name: Romeo Langford
comment: Langford (thigh) is out for Thursday's matchup against the Mavericks.

name: Devin Vassell
comment: Vassell (knee) has been ruled out for Thursday's matchup versus Dallas.

name: Fred VanVleet
comment: VanVleet (personal) has been ruled out of Thursday's contest against the Pelicans, Kayla Grey of TSN reports.

name: Otto Porter Jr.
comment: The Raptors announced Tuesday that Porter underwent season-ending surgery on his left foot, Marc J. Spears of ESPN.com reports.

name: Rudy Gay
comment: Gay has been ruled out  for the rest of Thursday's game against Oklahoma City after suffering a broken nose.

name: Collin Sexton
comment: Sexton (hamstring) did not practice Wednesday and he will be re-evaluated Monday.

name: Bradley Beal
comment: Beal (knee) is questionable for Friday's game against the Cavaliers, Neil Dalal of Hoop District reports.
